title: Open Gourmet Kitchens with Island*, 24/7 Package Concierge System
posting_body: ['Helios', '7901 Easte Belleview Avenue, Englewood, CO, 80111', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 22', 'OR Text', '22', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'ENJOY THE LIFE OF LUXURY', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 642 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Helios!', 'We’re an apartment community built for an Englewood lifestyle of social afternoons, daily exercise, and relaxing in your luxurious home.', 'Virtually tour our one- and two-bedroom floor plans with their high ceilings and private patios / balconies - move about the spacious interiors, and welcome in the outside air every day you’re with us.', 'Our residents have access to the amenities they need to meet the lifestyle they deserve.', 'Our community features a fitness center with weights and cardiovascular training equipment, an on-site technology hub, our off-leash dog park, and a sparkling pool.', 'Our community is located in the heart of the Denver Tech Center with Marina Square and Belleview Promenade at your doorstep.', 'Features', '- Air Conditioner', '- Extra Storage', '- Walk-in Closets', '- Ceiling Fans Throughout', '- Wide Plank Flooring*', '- Washer and Dryer', '- Tile Backsplashes*', '- 9- And 10-foot Ceilings*', '- Dishwasher and Disposal', '- Generously Sized Tubs and Shower with Tile Surrounds', '- Stainless-steel Appliances*', '- Private Patio or Balconies', '- Prewired with Fiber Optic and Cable', '- Intrusion Alarms Available for Monitoring*', '- Granite Countertops*', '- Open Gourmet Kitchens with Island*', '- Custom Wood Cabinets', '*Restrictions apply.', 'See Sales Associate for details.', 'Community Amenities', '- Night Patrol', '- Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace and Gas Grills', '- Kitchens', '- Resident Lounge with Catering Kitchen and Bar', '- Off-leash Dog Park', '- Conference Room For Meetings and Calls', '- Fitness Center with Cardio and Weight Equipment', '- 24/7 Package Concierge System', '- Technology Hub with Fully Connected Computer', '- Business Center', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Onsite Management', '- Elevator', '- Guest Room', '- Clubroom with Shuffleboard, Foosball, Pool Table and Large Screen TVs', '- Inviting Pool with Landscaped Sundecks', 'Office Hours', 'Monday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday:11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'PET POLICY', 'We Love Pets!', 'Please review our pet policy.', '1P1x1dPa']
